fmiModelDescription.description: Model validates the trim and respond block

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.resAmo
ScalarVariable.description: Respond amount (must have opposite sign of triAmo)

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.maxRes
ScalarVariable.description: Maximum response per time interval (must have same sign as resAmo)

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.uDevSta
ScalarVariable.description: On/Off status of the associated device

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.tim.delayOnInit
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to delay initial true input

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.netRes.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean switch input signal, if true, y=u1, else y=u3

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.swi.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean switch input signal, if true, y=u1, else y=u3

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.swi1.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean switch input signal, if true, y=u1, else y=u3

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.swi2.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean switch input signal, if true, y=u1, else y=u3

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.swi3.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Boolean switch input signal, if true, y=u1, else y=u3

ScalarVariable.name: trimRespondLogic.gai.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal
